data.name: Don't Waste a Precious Minute
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Leanne and John find themselves caged and suffering a mindless cycle of sleeping, waking and darkness. A strange creature delivers their food and ignores their cries for help. Given the chance to escape, John is forced to turn his back on Leanne and confront the unknown, where evil lurks and he is the trophy game.
data.about_the_game: Leanne and John find themselves caged and suffering a mindless cycle of sleeping, waking and darkness.  A strange creature delivers their food and ignores their cries for help. Given the chance to escape, John is forced to turn his back on Leanne and confront the unknown, where evil lurks and he is the trophy game.
data.short_description: John and Leanne are caged, desperate and losing track of time. Given the chance to escape, John is forced to turn his back on Leanne and confront the unknown, where he is the trophy game.
data.reviews:
“Creepy & effective.”
Tom Holland (Child's Play, Fright Night)

“The film retains a serious tone throughout and conjures feelings of immediate dread from the opening shot. A+”
A+ – Manic Horror Reviews

“I loved this film! Totally my cup of tea. Freaky and weird and awesome all wrapped up in 10 minutes.”
J'Nell Cee

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
